channel.title: Apoorva's Notes

item.title: Hello
item.description: I finally made my own personal website after many years of redirecting my domain directly to LinkedIn. Glad I found Hugo to leverage in order to make this. Also, I used Icons8 for the social icons on the About page. Currently using the Hugo Basic Theme which is simple enough to give me what I want. I will be testing out the projects feature next!

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Apoorva - a motorcycle riding video game developer currently working with Sucker Punch Productions. I do my best to disprove the following comment from Alain De Botton: Work finally begins when the fear of doing nothing exeeds the fear of doing it badly. This is my personal website where I host my public musings and projects. Hopefully a compelling personal counterargument to the above. Want to chat?
